kit.leader_skill: Super TEQ Type Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +120%

super_attack.name: Resist Blast (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK, raises DEF,; causes supreme damage to enemy; and greatly lowers DEF

passive_skill.name: Strength to Overcome Tension
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 260% up; (Forever) "Universe 6" or "Peppy Gals" Category allies' Ki +2 and ATK & DEF 40% up; (Forever) "Pure Saiyans" Category allies' ATK & DEF 20% up; When there is an ally whose name includes "Caulifla" on the team: DEF 160% up; Great chance of guarding all attacks; Launches an additional Super Attack; When there is an ally whose name includes "Caulifla" attacking in the same turn: Guards all attacks; For 1 turn from the character's entry turn: Launches an additional Super Attack; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 120% up; After performing 6 or more attacks in battle: (Forever) Launches an additional attack that has a great chance of becoming a Super Attack
